column5: Decided to go for a hike today, Out McConnell Lake area, past Dymond, Big and Little Mcdougall lake to see if the lakes were thawed yet. To my surprise there was still a good foot and a half snow on the main trails. This will be delaying my trip for lakers even further, but for whoever said the snow is all melted is only fooling themselves! haha Cheers.
Snow whats snow? That white stuff that fell out of the sky 2 months ago?  Damn you guys still have it not cool. How much Ice on the lake?
It was 88*F here today... not much snow around at all!

haha 20+ here today, so we went for a drive and a hike, the amount of snow in the back woods is just amazing, aha the lake, not even a good meter around the edges thawed out, none the less nowhere else on the lake  and id say a solid 6-9 inches ice remaing. Antsy to start fishing I tell ya ! Cheers

GCD your going to be fishing topless again remember this is a family site keep the pics clean  It was a nice day today you should be fishing realy soon. Good luck when ever you deside to head out onto open water
Can you please convert that for us.
haha , um 88 fahrenheit is about 31 celsius.
I knew you would know the answer,LOL  Just keep it up there ok.LOL
